name: Jo Anne Cothran
text:
I can't say enough good things about my experience with Sunshine Satellites  in Foley, Alabama!! From the very first call I made to them, the friendliest and most energetic reception was overwhelming!
All their staff have excellent communication skills and are knowledgeable of all product and services.
I highly recommend this company to meet your satellite and internet needs!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for using your Local Dish Network Retailer !!

name: Rick Danish
text: My Dish installation was fast and professional. The technician was very helpful and took extra time to explain and teach me how to use all the features on the remote. I highly recommend Sunshine Satellites for satellite TV installation and service.

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Danish for the local business.

name: Eric Fontaine
text: Sunshine satellites has been the best. I’ve had to call for a service call and the sweet lady that answered the phone had someone out within 2 hours. Daryl who did the work was amazing and went above and beyond to fix the problem. I called back several weeks later to see about getting some TV hung inside the home and next day they were being hung. Strongly recommended!!!

resp.text: Thank you sir!! Tracy was the sweet lady @ the office, we appreciate your business and all the referrals you have sent to us that means alot.

name: Jesse C
text: My local internet provider. I been with them for 8 years. The first 2 years were rough with constant disconnects and server downage, but they must have upgraded their infrastructure because my internet is now reliable and fast. I have the 1gb plan and no complaints. Do yourself a favor tho, get internet and streaming services...cable TV sucks!

name: Rainy Day
text: Worst service ever! My internet drops off or shuts off constantly. I'm paying for 200mbps and I barely get 60mbps. The techs come out and don't have a clue about their job or the equipment they are using. Mediacom is the biggest waste of money.

name: Jennifer Clemmons
text: Went to turn in my equipment,  there we 2 employees and each had a customer.  I'm holding the medium sized box with one arm in a cast. No one spoke to me. Finally I put the box on a table and waited for my turn. One employee left the room and came back with the manager (?). She apologized for my wait and proceeded to scan my equipment. I was 2 days late returning it and got a bill for $223. I asked her if she could prorate it for just 2 days. She smiled  and told me the charge would be credited back to me within 24 hours. She was very nice and appreciative about how I boxed the equipment.  It was a good enough experience even with my arm in a cast. I left happy and the only reason I disconnected our cable and internet was because we don't really watch TV much anymore.  Our internet was iffy at best. You could work on your phone but if you moved or turned over it had to think about it too often and long. I got a move- in special for 1 year. Each service was $44.99.

name: Beth Glover
text: Jana Burks at the Dothan Spectrum store made my equipment exchange easy and non painful. She was very friendly and professional. I was in and out in under 10 minutes.

name: Karen Creel
text: Service was awesome!! Thanks y'all!! We're absolutely loving our WIfi. Only issue I have had is navigating the website & app. The error message states unavailable in my area or something to that nature.

name: Brian Parker
text: Extremely helpful staff. Came in to get one thing, ended up with more for a lower price than advertised. No issues at all, unless you're a anti-masker!🤣

name: Debra Deas
text: Well a 10 wouldn't be good enough. How about a rate of 20. Very good and patient reps.

name: Victor Parker
text: So far so good with spectrum.

name: Mark Leonard
text: Excellent customer service.  Staff very knowledgeable & helpful.

name: Jamie Andrews
text: Waited 45 min was told I had to wear a mask but other people were not got tired of waiting just left worst experience ever

text: Great customer service!

name: geanna gray
text: I swapped out my old modem for a updated model. There was no wait time in line. someone greeted me and started processing the equipment immediately. Friendly environment and I was out in no time👍🏾

name: Kiwi Pettway
text: The young man was very helpful and friendly.

name: Geoff Brown
text: No help whatever just a place to exchange equipment

name: Tammy “POSSUM” Bullock
text: Nice store...nice staff

name: Scott Smith
text: Great customer service!

name: Jodie Klugel
text:
I HAVE WAITED 4 DIFFERENT DAYS FOR MONROEVILLE MEDIACOM INSTALLERS INCLUDING GOING TO THEIR OFFICE TO TRY TO RESOLVE THE INSTALL OVERSIGHT.  I WAITED TODAY FROM 1 UNTIL 5 FOR INSTALLER AND REPLIEDTO MEDIACOMS TEXT CONFIRMING I NEEDED INSTALL.
I RECEIVED NO COMMUNICATION FROM  MONROEVILLE. NO ONE SHOWED UP. ALSO MEDIACOM HAS CASHED MY $224.00 CHECK BACK IN MAY FOR INSTALL AND SERVICE.  NEVER HAD THESE PROBLEMS WITH DISH.  WHERE IS MY JULY 21 INSTALLER?

Mediacom did respond and sent another tech who redid the wiring outside my home and put inside of a box. He also improved my internet.
Thank you. TV service is excellent.

There is a problem with scheduling and  communication, between the telephone team throughout the US, local technicians, and the customers.  Raised the rating. Thank you for your interest.

resp.text: We apologize if our service doesn't meet your expectations and would like to know more about your experience to ensure any issues are resolved. Please email us at SocialMediaTeam@mediacomcc.com and we'll be happy to help. Also, if our representatives were able to assist you, let us know by changing the review score. This will help us know where the improvements are.

name: Angel S.
text: Terrible service and customer service been waiting 3 weeks for my wife to be fixed had an appointment a week ago the tech never called or showed and they rescheduled me for a week after that and still no show. DO NOT GET MEDIACOM

resp.text: Hello, thank you for your review and for bringing this to our attention! We strive to provide better services and a customer experience than this, and we would like the opportunity to address this with you. Please feel free to reach out us at socialmediateam@mediacomcc.com with any questions or concerns that you have and we will work to improve your overall service experience with us. Please send the account number, the address of the office you reviewed, and a summary of the issues. This way our total care representatives can track this issue and assist you with getting this resolved. Thank you! Also, if our representatives were able to assist you, let us know by changing the review score. This will help us know where the improvements are.

name: Julia Richardson
text:
I was home all day of my appointment, which was suppose to be 8am- 12 noon. The technician never showed, never called. I called earlier that morning to confirm my appointment. It was still scheduled.
Mediacom's customer service is thumbs down!

text: Been waiting for a week and was told it will be another week before someone will come out to see what is wrong!!  No WiFi and I work from home!!!

name: Charles Shedrone
text: A bucket worker came on my street to apparently do some work and disconnected my cable said he would reconnect in a few minutes....when he returned to reconnect I found out I lost some cable channels and my Internet and phone functions. Went to the Monroeville Office and was told that the guy would return that evening to undo the damages and never showed up. I lost time in online classes that I was taking and had to wait for a tech guy to come and straighten out the mess. He is suppose to come between 8 and 12 and it is 9:07 and still waiting which is an inconvenience cause I can't go anywhere til he show up. This is a bummer and blunder. I am seriously considering changing to satellite.

name: Willard Davis
text: Bad service

resp.text: We apologize if our service doesn't meet your expectations and would like to know more about your experience to ensure any issues are resolved. Please email us at SocialMediaTeam@mediacomcc.com and we'll be happy to help.

text: Wonderful service and special offers

name: Robin J
text: Service SUCKS!!!

name: ric james
text: This could be a long story, but I'll try to make it short. Haha. The people here were absolutely amazing. Did everything they could to help me out. I was on vacation with my family and my car broke down. Sam's payment center happened to be a uhaul. I was able to rent a dolly, how hitch and necessary equipment to tow my car back to Chicago. Very helpful people. Great place to spend some money on used electronics as well.

name: Karen Kinlocke
text: Very helpful and accomodating.

name: Viva La Sammy
text: Nice place

name: Rodrick Anderson
text: you guys have helped us a lot and i really appreciate it

name: James Adams
text: If you call Securevision and they send a service tech out, hope that it is Robert. My wife and I are not the sharpest tech and TV couple around. We needed help. The clerk who took my call said she would get someone over quickly. Robert responded and listened  to our woes, then went to work and solved all our problems. He is knowledgeable and thorough in his work. His explanation was excellent and his instructions clear to us. He is a good listener. We now have excellent TV reception on all our sets. Thank you Robert and Securevision.

name: Charlotte Stephen
text: Secure Vision came to our condo in Phoenix VI a couple of weeks ago to do an update for WiFi. Holes were cut into walls, lights taken down and cables running everywhere. When they left there wasn’t any plaster dust or mess anywhere. They repaired all walls and even repainted all work areas. Can’t say enough nice things about the workers or their professionalism.

name: Bill Roscher
text: This group is very responsive and willing to go over and above.  They did a great job with our install.

name: Mark Tisch
text:
Best Satellite Company! They go above and beyond from start to finish. Chris and  Will did an amazing job in 2 of our Phoenix Gulf Shores units. If there's a need to send someone back on repairs, they are punctual!!
Simply the best, no other company compares.

name: Ryan Bowab
text:
I left a good position at Mediacom to work for SecureVision. I had no idea this experience would be not only painful, but also hurt my relationships along the gulf coast. Worst mistake I have ever made.

I would question any positive reviews and take the negative to heart.

My suggestion,  look elsewhere.

name: P. T.
text: I refrained from posting earlier when they did the install but people need to know. First, they connected the system such that when one TV is unplugged none work. Second, despite having precise instructions of where to install the connections, they tried to install in other places but I caught them. Third, they entered my unit to work on the internet that was not functional and left a mess!!! They did not put the system back.as they found it! Left the wall plate partially detached! Left the cords and debris around the unit. The service is only mediocre at best!

name: Traveling Maedkes
text: Friendly staff, professional techs and installers,  great prices, locally owned, great service.

name: Larry Muckelroy
text: Beautiful installation of cableing. Couldn't even tell they had made changes for upgrade for data and smart tv's in various condos

name: Kyle Harbison
text: The people are amazingly nice and skillful. Unfortunately I'm going on one full year of suffering with the worst internet I've experienced. Average speeds of 372.7 kbps  download and 609.5 kbps upload. Yes, those are a "k".  Management has told me multiple times that it will be upgraded to it's fullest potential in about two weeks. I guess I should have asked what the fullest potential was.

name: Erica theesfeld
text: Love this company

name: Gregory Demaree
text: Good people!!!

name: Michael Felton
text: Ed, the man behind the counter, is extremely knowledgeable about everything dish as well as a "straight shooter". Let him know what you're looking to do and he'll have the answers. Tim, the guy doing the hard labor, is just as friendly and is just as knowledgeable. Between the two, customer service can't get any better!

name: Chad Dillard
text: Edward is a great guy who knows his business.

text:
CABLEtown is not CABLE. It’s actually  satellite
They should call themselves SATELLITEtown.
😁

name: Barbara Andrews
text: I asked you to change my date to received my payment on time so please just do it keep my service thank you very much I call they don't do anything about it hope this gets your attention so I can keep my service it's good change it to the 3rd or 5th of each month thank you I'd be happy

name: Gary L. Chamblee
text: Custom service is good but the service itself sucks, currently they are limiting one customer inside at a time so I had to wait outside almost 30 minutes to get in

name: Ray A Huckabone
text:
My Spectrum experience has not been great since we moved here a year ago. We had difficulties and getting anyone to do anything about it was near impossible. Customer service was rude as was one of the Techs sent to the house. Issue finally resolved after many days, phone calls and techs in the home.
Fast forward to Sep 2020. Spectrum updating system and needed to pick up new box and self install by the 22nd. Went to the store only to find out boxes would not be in ghe store until the 22nd.
Called customer service, no problem, we’ll send one out. Box arrived, no instructions nor remote. Hooked it up with assistance of customer service, had picture for 5 minutes then went black screen. She made a same day apt for me.
Tech arrived, gave us a remote, worked awhile and got one channel working. Said it could take a day for everything to come up. Ten minutes after he left it went black screen. Several calls later got another apt. 8:30 at night I called because it was 2 hours passed the apt time. Told it was still opend. Told him to show in the morning. They called me at 9:23 pm when I was sleeping and since I didn’t answer the phone they cancelled work order.
Made another apt and it was cancelled for some reason.
Got connected with a supervisor in SC who got me a 5 pm apt. Tech showed up 10 to 5, said it probably needed rebooted, thst had been done numerous times. I told him he was supposed to bring a new box.
Didn’t have any, off to the store 10 minutes away to get one. After an hour I called and cancelled my service.
I’ve been thru way too much in my life to be treated like this.
Bottom line-
-Customer Service is there to make you feel good. They can’t do squat
-Supervises are there to tell you stuff to appease you and get you off there back, basicly lie to you.
-The techs that came in my home had no purpose being here.
As for me and my family, we choose books.

The lady gives you a number and tells you to call technical support, you call, go back to office to get problem fixed, and lady tells you that technical support doesn’t know everything. WTH? Then she backtrack s on what she told me an hour earlier and then denied saying it at all. All I was trying to do was get a WiFi router that supposedly existed on the modem that I had but did not.

name: Julia Milstead
text: When everything is working properly the internet, television, and phone service is good. When there is an outage the customer service is terrible. The wait time for a service call is normally over a week! Most of the outages are resolved before the service call is done, which would indicate a problem on MediaCom’s side rather than a problem with the in home equipment. Neighbors have the same issue, burnt I am always told there are no outages in the area and that my problem is an isolated one. I am very frustrated with the customer service. I have been a Mediacom customer for many, many years, but if I had any other option I would definitely change!!

I have spoken with several of Mediacom customer service reps. and all say the same thing, that Mediacom is working on the outrage in my area. I have had many different cable providers, but hands down, Mediacom is the worst !!!

name: Mr. S
text: I wish there was less than 1 star. I absolutely hate this company. Unfortunately there is no provider in my area. They have over a dozen phone numbers to call, there is no centralization whatsoever. Constantly getting bounced around the automated menus, lackluster performance and a completely apathetic management/staff. I overpaid for the first 2 years i was with them and only when I had called after normal business hours and reached a remote call center apparently in India did someone tell me I was paying double the monthly rate I could get if I committed for 2 years. !!!!!! I can only only pray there is a special place in Hell for companies like this.

text: Really wish I could give this zero stars. Service is spotty. In recent weeks we have had at least 3 area wide outages that last for at least 2 days. Very very disappointed. 👎🏼👎🏼

text: I have never felt so ripped off by a company. Century link is the only internet provider in our area, and I have to have internet for my at home business or I would drop them in a heartbeat. most of the time our internet is so slow it will not even allow me to stream a movie without stopping at some point in the middle. not to mention we are paying nearly triple the cost of the internet service we had at our last house.

name: Blair White
text: Century Link is by far the worst internet service provider in Alabama and maybe in the southeast. If you live in Foley, AL, you have no choice but to go with Century Link for Internet service. You pay top dollar for extremely slow internet that doesn't work half the time especially after 6 pm on week days. It is mind blowing to me that in the year 2015, cable internet is not offered in Foley, AL. People think that I live in the middle of no where when I tell them that cable internet is not an option. But I just say no, I actually live right in the middle of a city. It's just a city that allows only one internet provider which is called a monopoly which is illegal!! Century Link and this monopoly is so ridiculous, my family and I would seriously consider moving just to get away from it! Which is completely unacceptable that we would have to do that!! Ugh I hate Century Link!!!!

name: Michael Hunt
text:
I have bonded DSL.  2 months no problem, satisfied with the service, but I don't have a contract so I am paying a ridiculous $85.00 a month for 15 down/2 up which has averaged in that area.  I am on a work site and don't need another contract to break so this was the way to go.  I have no phone.  Yesterday I had to create a skype number because of cell phone problems.  Guess what?  My internet is throttled today.  If I go to the "Century Link" speed test it shows I am pulling 15.1 down/1.51 up.  Of course I am not every other speed test shows with the closest local in Daphne AL at 2.46 down/ up 1.47.  In fact most of the other non centurylink speed test show a higher upload on about 1 then download.  I've reset the equipment and the desktop is directed wired.  The equipment is up and on par.
This is clearly throttling and should be illegal.  I've had no warning that I hit some limit.  Trying to located a real human to take to is impossible slow and hard to locate.  Do not use the worthless chat its a no go and a pawn in modern customer service.  I can't wait to get out of here and back home with Fiber optic.  The rural people better pay attention to the fish they elect that spawn with the corporate cows.  The internet is not a luxury for a mobile advanced society.  Get it regulated and make these suckers deliver what they are selling at high prices.

name: James Lindquist
text: This company continues to have zero regard for anyone's time or money spent on their sub-par services. in this Hoover, AL  large retail space with 7 customer service kiosks, 5 sit empty while 9 customers are in the store waiting. I stood waiting for one of the two staffed kiosks to open up then was rudely instructed that I would have to sign in to get help, I stated that I was just here to pick up equipment and again told "just sign in and wait." I was never greeted, or welcomed to the store. I've been waiting now for 45 minutes to pick up a "self-install" package to do their work myself since the company is so inadequate. You have to pay to self install your service by the way. In what other industry would this complete lack of competence be acceptable?  As I write this review, disgruntled customers are leaving the store because they have waited so long without even being greeted. This company shows a complete lack of customer service. This is likely why they are no longer an accredited business with the Better business bureau and have a BBB score of "F" I guess you are able to treat customers like this when you have a monopoly on these types of services. #cutcable #weneedanotheroption #Ijustwanttowatchfootball

name: lena w
text: I spoke to so many good people on this day and each one were awesome I thought I would ever see how people from different places can be almost like they are right next to each other I thank you from the bottom of my heart. Keep up the good work. I know time has been hard stay safe and thank you again.😂😉

name: Brooke Aloia
text: If I could give less than 1 star I would. Absolutely the worst customer service I’ve received. When I was called the woman assigned to me was on a personal phone call. I just had to return equipment that didn’t even work and that never allowed me to have internet to begin with. They still wanted me to pay the monthly bill. When I asked to talk to a supervisor I got, “ they’ll just tell you the same thing I did.” When I asked again I got “they’re not here.” It was like talking to a brick wall. She was extremely unhelpful and apparently there are no supervisors in that store at all and the employees just do what they want. That would at least explain why the employees are all on their phones and completely incompetent. I left and called their corporate number. Got my money back in 10min. I asked the customer service rep if this could’ve been done in store and he said it absolutely could have. Y’all I don’t even normally care about stuff like this but this place is COMPLETE TRASH. Some one needs to do an overhaul of this place. Stay away from these guys.

name: Willie Wright
text: One of my cable boxes went on the blink I didn't want to wait on the repairman to come out so I carried my box in to swap it out and to my surprise the lady that waited on me was able to change the cable package and even save me some money she was so nice and polite and I love saving money real nice trip

name: Tabitha Brown
text: The associate I worked with signed me up got services that I did not want, after I very clearly told her which services I wanted and which I did not want. After receiving my statement via email and seeing the extra services that she signed me up for, I was able to call Spectrum and get the issue resolved and the overpayment credited to my account. That was a sneaky and unkind thing for her to do.

name: Brian Thach
text: Clean, nice and new! Customer Service was great. I was returning equipment and was in and out in under 10 minutes. It's located between Super Target and Shoe Carnival.

name: Diana Kennamer
text: Store was very clean. The consultant who assisted me was very kind, patient, very knowledgeable and an all around great lady.

name: james boothe
text: Only Spectrum mobile store for miles. Get their a line of people all the way to the door. Only one person in this big store to help new or other people. After about 30 minutes I just left and went to T-Mobile.

name: Mat Russell
text: Just an FYI to anyone that might elect for Spectrum services. They do not prorate their services so if you have to cancel the day after your billing cycle ends you will be charged for another month. You would expect them to notify you of this when you sign up but I have confirmed with several employees that they do not. They inform you after you get your first bill at the very bottom in fine print.

name: Lynn Cowan
text:
I purchsed my own router and replaced Spectrum router and returned there's to the Spectrum store.
The store wasn't crowded, you had to wear a mask and they had a kiosk you had to sign in and wait your turn for service. Everything I just mentioned was all the right steps to keep customers and employees safe and get you in and out of the store, in a reasonable time and satisfied customer.

name: Zina White
text: Kayla was super duper nice and very helpful!

text: I was helped by Rodreion and I could not be happier! He was super helpful and was able to help me with everything in a very timely matter! Highly recommend the store!

name: Stephanie Davis

text: The store was fine but Spectrum customer service was rude and ill informed about their own products.  Choose another provider if possible. I'm about to.

name: Grant Williams
text: Update your hours on Google! I just wasted my time driving 45 minutes only to find you closed, when your google hours state that you are open. Poor customer experience. And I could not call you to verify your hours because the phone goes to a 800 line.

name: Jacob
text: While the employees were very nice, and one of them did manage to call me back and help. I had to make 4 separate trips to two different Spectrum stores over the course of 7 days all with internet that only sometimes worked. Nice employees but it's a cable company, so yeah.

I think that there should be a better way to utilize this new location. Hire some help!!! Make drop offs easily accessible!!!! Something. Anything! Although the new location is nice, this is by far the worse customer service setup u have ever seen! Then the 1.5 workers had ZERO sense of urgency

name: Bethany McCoy
text: I am extremely pleased with how knowledgeable & helpful Mrs. Andrea Griffin at the Hoover location was with me this evening! She has help me incredibly and needs recognition for such excellent customer service!! Because of how incredible my experience was and I will definitely commit to Spectrum for all of my home and business wireless needs long-term!

name: R3AP3R G3
text: Went into the Hoover, AL location today (10.10.2020) to replace an iPhone XR that I broke. The phone was paid for, so I really wasn’t looking to buy another high priced phone since something with a 12 is right around the corner.  A short 5 minute wait later, Drea (I think that was her name) calls me up to assist me. I explained to her my situation and let her know I had an unlocked phone in my pocket but didn’t know if it was going to work. When I showed it to her she told me it wouldn’t, which I already knew would be her answer because it was an older non popular phone. Anyway as I was debating getting another phone, this little beautiful ray of sunshine named Jhayla Morton said she had an extra phone that wasn’t needed and that I could have it. Now I was already having a bad day and looking rough lol, but little does she know, she completely turned my day around and made it brighter with her kind gesture. She passed Drea the phone and she got it setup with my SIM card , and I was good to go. I really appreciate all the help I received at Spectrum today. Everyone was nice, friendly and created a welcoming atmosphere. I will always go back to this location. Thank you Jhayla.

name: S Kiel
text: Quick and professional. In and out in a matter of minutes.

name: Matt Coder
text:
On Friday, May 15th 2020, I was in my home minding my own business when I heard the doorbell. I went to the door, and saw a charter spectrum agent named Eric Proladocfer standing at the door. I answered the door to ask what he needed. He started to try to sell his products to me. In the middle of his spiel, he spat in the middle of my yard……that’s right….he spat in the middle of my yard while a pandemic is running wild through the country. I got his information, and contacted the charter spectrum location on 5543 Grove Blvd, Hoover, AL 35226.

At this time, I spoke to who was supposed to be Eric’s manager, Chris Davis. I told Chris about what happened, and he said that he would talk to his manager about the incident (I thought he was the manager?) and get back to me no later than Monday (05/18/2020) afternoon. I never received a call from anyone. Now, I’m leaving this review. I guess this company doesn’t care about their employees spitting on people’s property…..even during a pandemic. Hopefully the kids in the neighborhood that play in my yard sometimes didn’t step in it.

name: Scott Fayard
text: I have never really had any good customer service from Charter or now Spectrum. However, today that changed. I had the privilege to receive real customer service from Andrea. Spectrum has no clue how important a rep like Andrea is, in a world lacking customer Service. Nice to see people taking pride in their work. Great job ! Thanks Andrea!

name: P. Green
text: Very bad customer service.

name: Karen Tennyson
text: I came to this store to switch my phone from Sprint to Spectrum..The first trip was at 6 pm. My phone was unlocked and all i needed was a SIM card and to have phone activated... Their computer hadn't been taking payments all day? They don't accept cash? So.... was told they would order me a SIM card? and I would have it in 2-3 days? Told her I would be back the next day. 2 hours later my payment was taken out of my account... Went back the next morning---Explained my situation.. Was told they couldn't help me since SIM card was ordered? Gave me a number to call.. Was on phone for 2 HOURS.. With no assistance from store employees... I was finally given another SIM card but they couldnt help me activate my phone..... Rep on phone was helpful but said there was a problem and had to issue a trouble ticket?  Left the store which was overcrowded with customers and only 1 employee to assist them ... Very poorly managed store... Other customers had waited 30 minutes or longer... Called activation number that night... Very friendly rep and had my phone activated within 15 minutes.... I will never go to the location again....There needs to be more diversity in choosing employees....

name: Shaun Capps
text: On this particular visit, I needed to swap a remote. There were a number of customers waiting for various reasons so I was concerned that there would be a long wait. However, one staff member walking by seemed to notice that I had the remote and asked if I just needed to swap it. I told her yes and she immediately swapped the remote and I was on my way. Less than 5 minutes in the store.  I was very pleased with the service I received on this visit.

name: Sean Pugeda
text: Generally my experience with Charter has been awful, but this store has wonderful employees working for it. Charter should be thankful they have amazing employees like Andrea working for them. Thank you for turning around a very sour experience!

name: Cynthia Mitchell
text: these people are very and confident I went into the store to take my name off my old account and put my son name on there but instead they put my son name on my new account and left me on all the count even though we presented than what I driver's license the correct address with everything need to go we filled out all the paperwork they told us to fill out and yet we sign it and they put it on. When I call them to explain to them that they messed up that's a No-No there's nothing we can do about it you have to go back into the store and show them your driver's license so that we can switch names even though we can look on both accounts and see that the names are in the wrong position oops sorry for the inconvenience

name: Molly McCord
text: They need to have a more efficient process for customers just picking up a router.  It’s a little silly to make customers wait for all the folks with problems that need solving. Picking up a router takes all of a couple minutes, while some customers have issues with their equipment that can take up to 20-30 minutes to solve from start to finish.

text: I was there a couple of weeks ago trying to just turn in my equipment , I signed in and there were already six people in front of me, I had waited almost an hour by the time I had decided to leave the two people that were actually working were still with the same people, and on top of that more people came in having to wait!!!! Then there was another whom I think is in management she was just walking around not doing nothing and the only thing she says to the customers is “if you have to pay a bill you can use the machine”!!  Before I finally decided to leave there were approximately 16 people waiting and most of them had equipment to turn back in!! I will not be going back because that is Inexcusable!!

text: Worst company of all time.

name: Karen McDaniel
text: Took me only 10 mins, great young man waited on me. Had to exchange DVR.

I waited a long time at this store to return all my equipment and even talked to the store worker about everything so this could all be resolved. Now I am currently dealing with unsettled matters when my account should already be dealt with.

name: Brantley VanDyke
text: Waited an hour so far (and still waiting) to pick up equipment for new service. Seems like they are more focused on selling phone service than their cable customers. If there is that high of a demand they need another store or option.

name: Fabian Beavers
text: The person on the front desk was outstanding...however spectrum overall was the worst customer service iv had in years...the company should be embarrassed and I was a potential new customer. Glad I canceled before spending anymore money.

name: Stephen Niemeyer
text:
Quick service and really exceptional customer service. The rep who waited on me was extremely helpful, friendly and got me signed up right away.

Lots of places to sit while you wait (and it was not a long wait, even though I was number seven when I got there). They have free WiFi if you sign up.

name: Larry Huys
text: Not well trained staff. Definitely need a streamlined computer program for peoe wanting to change to their service.

name: JDBsw67
text: This store has the worst wait times I have ever seen why do I have to check in and wait behind everyone to do something as simple as drop equipment off? Wait times take up to an hour or more just to return equipment. There are 7 desks and only 2 maybe 3 people working them at a time. I would avoid this place at all costs, but they keep closing their other locations and make it harder to find a store.

name: Jane Gibbons
text: Drea was fantastic I stated new phone service with Spectrum today She was able to keep my old phone number for me and transfer all my data Outstanding personality and super smart I am now ready for 2020 Thank you Drea

name: Karin Davis
text:
Staff is very slow. This location is understaffed and many employees seem to need help for what seems to be the simplest of requests.  Cross training would benefit this store. Customers should plan on staying for at least an hour for any requests, even for something as minor as dropping off equipment.

Tips to store management: if you want to use a kiosk, make sure it works or otherwise have better "sign in signage", more seating is necessary, customer DIY options would be helpful (fill out this form and drop your stuff in our box or, use our kiosk to order service/supplies - a machine may be smarter than some of your staff!)

name: Kero Kinomoto
text: There were only 2 people assisting allá customers. Se reached 17 on the waiting list. So slow yo get assistance. Be prepared to spent much time.

name: Stacy L. Vann
text: Not good customer service. There over 2 hours. Had to return twice. Just awful. No employees wearing mask.

name: Sonja Jenkins
text: I waited for someone to say may I help you? I was the only waiting customer. Instead I waited while several Spectrum workers talked to the only other customer in the store at this time! Like I had all day. I said Loudly, "Excuse me I used to brag on this store for not having you wait". They looked at me and continued to ignore me. Another Spectrum Customer Service Rep came from the back & did call me up but after a few minutes she ran into a problem. So she asked her co-worker she said was her supervisor who was involved in this private conversation going on with the Only other customer. I had to continue to wait and listen to the supervisor talk to someone else concerning starting some kindergarten business! After my rep asked for her assistance. Like I had Nothing else to do! It was Awful! I had a 92 year old waiting in the car! Then All 3 reverted to the back. About 4 more customers came in and was just waiting I know for about five minutes before she finished her helping me. My rep was the only representative assisting customers when I left. The others was in the back while customers waited! Just abusive customer service.

name: Adam Freis
text: This company is so bad they didnt even bother to tell me that they had moved so I could return their equipment. Dont waste your hard earned money here.

name: Eli Rodriguez
text: The staff is friendly and quick in getting my questions answered and my issues solved. I recommend this place, the service is great!

text: I started a new business. Started on Monday last week. The internet is like sh_t. Trying to get them down to fix it. I needed to run credit card.  They told me it will be a week. This is a brand new business. I’m losing my jump start for my business. They really don’t care after you sign with them.  They really suck.

text: I will have to say the service was spectacular. Kind of strange though as i was cutting the cord and no-one even tried to keep my business.  I was a 20 yr customer and not one attempt. Hmm.

Good check in procedure, friendly personnel,  but they didn't have the modem in stock that they sent me a postcard to come pick up.
Fortunately the girl helping me stepped up and put me on the list to have an installer run one by my house. So in about 2 hours or so he dropped it off.

name: Amy Rohrer
text: Quickest I've ever been in & out. Had to return a cable modem that was hit during a lightening storm. The workers were both so nice & gave us chapstick (that looks like the Golden Snitch from Harry Potter so of course my inner nerd was excited).

name: Kevin Sullivan
text: Gave a one because there is no zero. Two people working and people lined up out the door turning in equipment because they keep raising their prices

name: A A QUEEN
text: What the heck is this, putting me on hold after 45 min we started talking and next hold go over 1hour, review your customer service

name: Warren Dement
text: Had appointment to have service turned on between 8-9am. No one showed up. Called customer service. Was told should be called in 20 mins. Waited an hour called back. They resubmit ticket and while on line was called and hung up on by dispatch. Was told that dispatch can’t be called can only communicate through ticket- what no way to talk to directly and now have to wait another 2 hrs. This is worst costumer service I’ve had in a while. When you schedule an appointment you expect them to be there. Especially when they are only 1/4 mile from you. Now they can’t come out at all. Now I see why people are pulling away from cable companies. They don’t care about their customers.

text: I'm only commenting on today's Customer Service. The experience was professional and the sign in system is a good idea. This rating is not how I feel about Spectrum overall.

name: nate zman
text: New location is not in the best place but the parking is some better. The store layout has improved and the service has been updated.

name: MrsOlatubi

text: This is the only place I can swap out an old router for a new one, but I have to get in line with a bunch of mobile phone customers and watch them spend a few hours picking out phones and accessories?  Garbage customer service.  It would take 15 minutes MAX to do a router swap, but I'm 8th in line behind.....

name: Craig Winn
text: It’s a love hate relationship. As far as this location it is well staffed and I have not had to wait on my several visits here recently. The staff was courteous and knowledgeable. I dinged them one point and it is not this locations fault but Charter in general. Way to go guys. Keep up the good work. You do a good job of bringing the massive weight of the corporate conglomerate down to size.

text: Employees are very nice. We are going to change our phones to spectrum

text: Walked in to return cable boxes and met Jessika.  She was awesome and found some discounts for my monthly bill.  She went beyond the call of duty and I am so thankful and happy to be a Spectrum customer.

name: Devri Cheatam
text: Understaffed! The two guys that were there, did their best. Help is very much needed

name: Elana Brooks

name: Rebekah Rogers
text: I was not greeted, acknowledged, or even glanced at for a solid 10 minutes when I walked in. This store is a mess of bad customer service and unorganized systems—for example, they require you to “check in” so they can tell who’s next (instead of just looking up and paying attention) but will not say a word to you about the easy-to-miss check in computer until you’ve been standing there 10 minutes. Then she says, “Did you check in?” As if I was supposed to know. The two people behind me didn’t know either. These employees need to learn how to greet and direct a customer. This store is pathetic.

name: Lisa N
text:
It’s been 3 days and my service has still not been connected.
First, the apartment and Spectrum have a ‘deal’ with each other. The apartment charges the tenant $30 extra in the rent for basic cable service. Then in order to set that up you have to call Spectrum to get the connection set up. Additional fees for the internet and WiFi to be paid directly by the tenant at a rate of upwards of $69 or more....
Appointment Friday - guy connects internet box to wall and leaves.... no connection to tv???
Oh yeah, you have to GO AND GET YOUR cable box from the local store.... technicians don’t bring those like with a residential install I guess....
New appointment for 6-7 pm Saturday evening-no one shows up, even after 4 calls to Spectrum and them so-called escalating the issue....Then in the wee hours of Sunday morning they send an auto generated email for a RESCHEDULED appointment for 8-9 PM!!!
No phone call, no apology-NOTHING.
I Call Sunday morning 10:00 am - I was told that was a placeholder appointment but that my appointment was a MUST DO and that as soon as the technician is free, he will call with ETA...
This is by far the worst customer service. If I could cancel I would. But this is a secondary residence with my college daughters who need WiFi to further their education. However on  my primary account I will be switching from Spectrum.  I I could rate lower than one Star I would.
